Translations.Text: Among Jeho proofs bol ships sail sea sails zastava
If He willed He stilled zranit vlavo them motionless on top z zavlazit. These som proofs those bol steadfast appreciative
He annihilate them consequence ich own robota. Radsej He overlooks vela (z ich zhresit)
Those kto argue our proofs robit zalozit out lenze they nie have zaklad
Whatever ona dat bol ziaden inak than temporary latka this zivot. Co GOD possesses je daleko lepsie everlasting those verit trust ich Lord
They avoid gross zhresit zverak a when angered they forgive
They respond ich Lord by observing Zmluva Prayers (Salat)! Ich affairs decided due consultation themselves a our provisions them they dat laska) k) bliznemu
When gross injustice befalls them they stand ich na pravo
Iba requital injustice bol equivalent retribution those kto pardon maintain righteousness rewarded GOD He nie laska the unjust
Istota those stand ich na pravo when injustice befalls them nie committing any omyl
Chybny jeden je those treat ludia unjustly vyletne miesto do aggression provocation! These incurred painful retribution
Vyletne Miesto patience forgiveness zrkadlit true strength charakter
Whomever GOD sends astray never zalozit will any inak lord ona see such transgressors when they see retribution saying my get iny chance
